title: Pasting From Illustrator is easy however...
content: the glyph is pasted in the lower left corner and i am unable to move it to the baseline ect. any thoughts? ![cant move](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106082654im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4101/36417.gif)
author: hello_caleb

comments.content: maybe you got too much points in your glyph?
